title: iSpring Suite 7.0.0 build 5775 (64 bit) (for PowerPoint) [ChingL
description:
Brand new iSpring Suite combines professional products that enable you to quickly create highly engaging, interactive e-Learning courses based on PowerPoint. iSpring Suite is a combination of iSpring Pro, iSpring QuizMaker and iSpring Kinetics, all tightly integrated to work effectively within PowerPoint. iSpring Pro provides the opportunity to create PowerPoint-based courses with synchronized audio and video narrations, content protection and customizable players. Adding graded quizzes and surveys to presentations is made possible by iSpring QuizMaker.

Perfect Integration with PowerPoint - iSpring Suite 7 simply adds a tab to the PowerPoint ribbon and provides access to all the advanced e-Learning features right in a familiar PowerPoint environment. Converts even sophisticated PowerPoint effects 

Create Tons of E-Learning Courses and Video Lectures - A variety of e-Learning materials will make the e-Learning process far more effective. Create compelling courses, video lectures, quizzes or assessments, all with iSpring Suite 7. Turn your PowerPoint projects into engaging and effective e-Learning courses. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s easy to give your content an upgrade with advanced features provided by iSpring Suite: 
-Characters to add personal touch 
-Notes with brief explanations
-Ã¢â‚¬Å“Talking headÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ videos insertion .

Interactive Quizzes and Surveys - Build smart interactive quizzes and surveys to supplement the whole course or create a self-contained assessment to keep up with your learnersÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ level of knowledge. Create efficient quizzes of various complexity and enjoy further capabilities of built-in quiz maker tool: 
-23 question types, including drag-and-drops
-Advanced branching scenarios 
-Customizable slide appearance
-Audio and video insertion

Rich Media Interactions - Present the learning materials in a clear and impressive way. Be sure that all the interactions will be viewable from any device. All of them Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Book, Timeline, Directory and FAQ Ã¢â‚¬â€œ will work perfectly in a mobile-ready HTML5 format. 

Vitalize Your Content

Use Extensive Character Library - Tell your story more effectively and earnestly by putting words in characterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mouth. Pick the perfect one from a wide range of actors making various gestures give your content a personal touch. 

ÃÂ¡reate Your Custom Characters - If you need more characters to fully reflect your ideas, you can easily create a new character with iSpring Character Wizard. Simply upload the images of your choice to iSpring Suite 7, and they will be saved in your character collection. 

Excellent Support of Mobile Devices - Design cross-platform e-Learning content for any device your learners prefer: iSpring Suite 7 easily converts your PowerPoint projects to a mobile-ready HTML5 format. 

Courses on iPad. Even Offline. 

Free iPad Application allows learners to access their assignments anytime and anywhere and provides: 
-nice edge-to-edge representation
-conveniently streamlined content library
-all the assignments in one click availability
-viewing content even offline

Publish Your Courses in One Click!

With iSpring Suite 7 you can choose your preferred method of sharing content. Accurately prepare the course for different purposes. You can choose one of convenient publishing presets: 
-Web: post your content on the Internet
-LMS: SCORM-, AICC, Tin Can API (Experience API) compatible
-iSpring Learn LMS: direct publishing in one click

Broad LMS Compatibility - Flawless support of SCORM and AICC standards ensures seamless integration of iSpring-created content with e-Learning environment of your choice. No special adjustments needed to receive detailed reports on your coursesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ views. Tin Can API (Experience API) support enables to record and track even more detailed info on your course takersÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ activity and learning results from multiple sources. 

System Requirements

Hardware 
-Computer and processor Intel/AMD 1 GHz or faster processor 
-Memory 1024 MB RAM, 2 GB recommended 
-Hard disk 500 MB available disk space 
-Display 1024x768 or higher resolution monitor 
-Color depth 32-bit or greater video card 
-Sound Sound card and microphone (for recording narration) 

Software

-Internet Explorer Internet Explorer 6.0 or higher 
-Adobe Flash AdobeÃ‚Â® FlashÃ‚Â® Player ActiveX 10.1 or higher
